verses.1: Tua lai tungah a min a gelh masa mite a masa pen Hilkiahʼ tapa, gam ukpa Nehemiah hi a, tua ciangin Zedekiah in zom hi. Tua ciangin
verses.8: Maaziah, Bigai le Shemaiah in gelh uh hi.
verses.9: Azaniahʼ tapa Jeshua, Henadad-te beh Binnui, Kadmiel,
verses.13: Hodiah, Bani le Beninu ahi uh hi.
verses.27: Maluk, Harim le Baanah-te ahi uh hi.
verses.28: A om lai Israel mite, siampite, Levi mite, kongcingte, lasate, biakinn nasemte, a zite a tapate le a tanute, thu tel theihna a nei, Pasianʼ thukham hangin gamdang mite panin a tuam om mi khempeuh in
verses.29: a sanggam uh ahi amauʼ makaite pawmin, Pasianʼ nasem Moses in a piak Pasianʼ thukham zui-in, eiteʼ Topa ahi Topaʼ thupiakna khempeuh, ama ngeinate le ama thukhamte a zuih nading uh kiciamna a bawl uh hi.
verses.30: Gamdang mite tungah i tanute i kha kei dinga, i tapateʼ zi dingin zong i la kei ding hi.
verses.31: Hih mite in Sabbath ni-in van ahi a, an ahi zongin hong zuak leh Sabbath ni le ni siangtho khat peuhpeuh ni-in i lei kei ding hi. Kum sagihna-a an piangte nusia-in tua kumin leiba khempeuh i maisak ding hi.
verses.32: Eiteʼ Pasianʼ biakinn ah nasep nading ahi Ompihna Anlum, a manmanin an tawh biakna, a manmanin meihal biakna, Sabbath ni, Khadet ni, a kiseh pawite, biakna letsongte le Israel miteʼ tangin a kibawlsak ahi kilemna bawl nadingin mawhna hanga biaknate le i Pasianʼ biakinn ah sep ding a kisam dangte khempeuh ah zat dingin kum simin shekel khat seh thum ah khat piak ding ka kiciam uh hi.
verses.34: Tua ciangin thukham sunga a kigelh bangin a kiseh hunin a kumkumin Topa eiteʼ Pasianʼ biakna tau tungah cih dingin beh a banbanin i Pasianʼ biakinn sungah sing a kitut nadingin siampite, Levi mite le ko mi vekpite in sing pua ding sehna ai ka san uh hi.
verses.35: I leitang panin a piang anpalte le singgah kungte panin a gah masa khempeuh a kumkumin Topaʼ biakinn ah puak ding ka kiciam uh hi.
verses.36: Thukham sunga kigelh mah bangin i Pasianʼ biakinn ah a om, i Pasianʼ biakinn sungah na a sem siampite kiangah zong tapa upa pente le bawngteʼ tacilte le ganhonteʼ tacilte le tuuhonteʼ tacilte paipih ding,
verses.37: le annel lom meek masak pen siampite tungah puak ding le gah nei sing khempeuh panin a gah masa, sathau le leenggahzu thakte khempeuh i Pasianʼ biakinn sung vankoihna ah puak ding le lokhawhna khuaneute khempeuh ah sawm-ah-khat a kaikhawmte pen Levi mite ahih manin leitang panin sawm-ah-khat khempeuh Levi mite kiangah puak ding ka kiciam uh hi.
verses.38: Levi mite in sawm-ah-khat a khop uh ciangin Aaronʼ suan siampite tawh hih khawm ding uh hi. Tua ciangin Levi mite in i Pasianʼ biakinn sunga vankoihna a kilawm mun inn deite ah sawm-ah-khat a ngah uh sung pan sawm-ah-khat puak sawn ding uh hi.
verses.39: Bang hang hiam cih leh biakinn umlebeelte a kikoihna inn deite le na a sem siampite, kongcingte le lasate a giahna inn deite ah Israel mite le Levi mite in a kipia ante, leenggahzu le sathaute a paipih ding uh ahi hi. Eiteʼ Pasianʼ biakinn kin loin i om kei ding hi.
